title: [LFM] [5v5 Flex] Looking for Bronze-Silver players looking to climb Flex with teammates. [OCE]
body:
About to hit Level 30 and looking for 4 teammates that are interested in playing Ranked Flex. If interested add me and message me your preferred position and role, availabilities on when you can play and some things about you like where you're from, age ect.... 

If interested add my summoner, Shmalness.
